Package edu.ntnu.idatt2106_09.backend.service.shoppinglist

Interface ShoppinglistService

All Known Implementing Classes:
ShoppinglistServiceImplementation
@Service public interface ShoppinglistService

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    ShoppinglistDto
    addShoppinglist(ShoppinglistDto shoppinglistDto)
    Adds a new shopping list to a given household.
    void

    Deletes the Shoppinglist with the given ID.

  • Method Details

    • addShoppinglist

      ShoppinglistDto addShoppinglist(ShoppinglistDto shoppinglistDto)
      Adds a new shopping list to a given household.
      Parameters:
      shoppinglistDto - a ShoppinglistDto object containing the shopping list information to be added.
      Returns:
      a ShoppinglistDto object containing the information of the newly created shopping list.
      Throws:
      BadRequestException - if the name of the shopping list is empty, the household does not exist, the shopping list already exists for the household, or if the household already has a shopping list.

    • updateShoppinglist

      ShoppinglistDto updateShoppinglist(ShoppinglistDto shoppinglistDto)
      Update a shopping list with the given ShoppinglistDto object.
      Parameters:
      shoppinglistDto - the ShoppinglistDto object to update the shopping list with
      Returns:
      the updated ShoppinglistDto object
      Throws:
      BadRequestException - if the ID or name of the shopping list is null or empty, or if the shopping list is not found

    • getShoppinglistById

      ShoppinglistDto getShoppinglistById(Long shoppinglistId)
      Retrieves a ShoppinglistDto by its unique ID.
      Parameters:
      shoppinglistId - the ID of the shoppinglist to retrieve
      Returns:
      a ShoppinglistDto representing the shoppinglist with the given ID
      Throws:
      NotFoundException - if no shoppinglist is found with the given ID

    • deleteShoppinglist

      void deleteShoppinglist(Long shoppinglistId)
      Deletes the Shoppinglist with the given ID. If the Shoppinglist is associated with a Household, the Household's shoppinglist will be set to null and updated in the database after the Shoppinglist is deleted.
      Parameters:
      shoppinglistId - the ID of the Shoppinglist to be deleted
      Throws:
      NotFoundException - if no Shoppinglist with the given ID is found in the database
